name: Soccer Random
desc: Physics-based soccer game where teams compete with unpredictable ragdoll movements
longDesc: Soccer Random features two teams competing in short soccer matches with ragdoll physics creating unpredictable and chaotic gameplay. Each round changes the playing field, ball physics, or player abilities, making every match unique.

name: 10 Minutes Till Dawn
desc: Survive waves of enemies for 10 minutes in this bullet heaven shooter
longDesc: 10 Minutes Till Dawn is a roguelite shooter where you fight increasingly difficult waves of creatures for exactly 10 minutes. Upgrade your character's abilities and weapons as you progress through each run.

desc: Sliding tile puzzle where you combine numbered tiles to reach 2048
longDesc: 2048 is a mathematical puzzle game played on a 4Ã—4 grid. Slide tiles in four directions to combine matching numbers, which merge into their sum. The objective is to create a tile with the number 2048.

name: Backrooms
desc: First-person exploration game set in the eerie endless yellow maze
longDesc: Backrooms recreates the internet phenomenon of liminal spaces. Navigate through endless yellow rooms with buzzing fluorescent lights while avoiding entities that lurk in the maze. The atmosphere focuses on psychological horror and disorientation.

name: Slope
desc: Fast-paced endless runner where you control a ball down a steep slope
longDesc: Slope is an endless running game featuring a ball rolling down a neon-colored slope at increasing speeds. Navigate through obstacles and gaps while the game progressively gets faster, testing your reflexes and timing.

name: Retro Bowl
desc: American football management and playing game with retro 8-bit graphics
longDesc: Retro Bowl combines team management with on-field gameplay. Manage your roster, handle press conferences, and control the offense during games. The pixelated art style and simple controls make it accessible while maintaining strategic depth.

name: Run 3
desc: Space-themed endless runner with gravity-defying mechanics across platforms
longDesc: Run 3 takes place in space where you run through tunnels that defy gravity. Switch between characters with different abilities, navigate gaps and obstacles, and explore various game modes including story progression.

name: Drift Boss
desc: One-button drifting game where you navigate winding roads
longDesc: Drift Boss simplifies drifting mechanics into a single button control. Hold to turn right and release to go straight, navigating an endless winding road. The challenge increases as the road becomes more complex.

name: Bitlife
desc: Text-based life simulator where you make choices from birth to death
longDesc: Bitlife simulates an entire lifetime through text-based choices. Make decisions about education, career, relationships, and activities that affect your character's health, happiness, and success. Each playthrough creates a unique life story.
features: Life simulation from birth to death

name: Big Tower Tiny Square
desc: Precision platformer where a tiny square climbs a big tower to rescue a pineapple
longDesc: Big Tower Tiny Square is a challenging precision platformer. Navigate through increasingly difficult rooms filled with hazards and obstacles. The checkpoint system allows for quick restarts after failures.

name: Cluster Rush
desc: First-person parkour game where you jump between moving trucks
longDesc: Cluster Rush puts you on top of speeding trucks in a first-person view. Jump between vehicles, avoid obstacles, and maintain momentum through challenging courses. Timing and spatial awareness are critical.

name: Drift Hunters
desc: 3D drifting game with realistic physics and customizable cars
longDesc: Drift Hunters offers a realistic drifting experience with multiple tracks and cars. Earn points through drifting to upgrade and customize your vehicle's performance and appearance. Features a detailed tuning system.

name: Drive Mad
desc: Physics-based driving game with challenging obstacle courses
longDesc: Drive Mad combines driving with physics-based puzzles. Navigate vehicles through increasingly complex courses filled with ramps, obstacles, and hazards. Balance speed with control to reach the finish line.

name: Getaway Shootout
desc: Chaotic multiplayer game where players race to the extraction point
longDesc: Getaway Shootout is a side-scrolling action game where 2-4 players compete to reach the getaway vehicle. Use weapons and power-ups while navigating with awkward hopping controls. Features both local and AI opponents.

name: Motox 3M
desc: Motorcycle stunt game with physics-based tricks across obstacle courses
longDesc: Motox 3M features motorcycle racing through obstacle-filled courses. Perform flips and stunts for bonus points while maintaining speed. Time-based completion adds a competitive element to each level.

name: Rooftop Snipers
desc: Two-player dueling game on rooftops with physics-based shooting
longDesc: Rooftop Snipers pits two characters against each other on building rooftops. Use simple controls to jump and shoot, with ragdoll physics determining the outcome. First to knock their opponent off wins.

name: Slope 2
desc: Sequel to Slope with enhanced graphics and new challenging obstacles
longDesc: Slope 2 builds on the original with improved visuals and new gameplay elements. Roll through neon-lit courses at high speeds while avoiding obstacles. Features enhanced physics and more complex level designs.

name: Snow Rider 3D
desc: Snowboarding game where you ride down snowy mountains avoiding obstacles
longDesc: Snow Rider 3D puts you on a snowboard descending mountain slopes. Navigate through trees, rocks, and jumps while collecting gifts. The game features procedurally generated terrain and increasing difficulty.

name: Superhot
desc: First-person shooter where time moves only when you move
longDesc: Superhot's unique mechanic makes time progress only when the player moves. Plan your actions strategically as bullets move in slow motion, allowing you to dodge and counter. Each level is a puzzle requiring precise timing.

name: Tunnel Rush
desc: High-speed tunnel racing game testing reflexes and reaction time
longDesc: Tunnel Rush sends you through a colorful tunnel filled with obstacles at increasing speeds. Dodge barriers by moving left and right while the game's pace accelerates. Features psychedelic visual effects.

name: Vex 5
desc: Platformer featuring a stick figure navigating deadly obstacle courses
longDesc: Vex 5 is the fifth installment in the precision platformer series. Control a stick figure through levels filled with spikes, saws, and moving platforms. Features both standard levels and challenge acts with harder variants.

name: Worlds Hardest Game
desc: Precision maze game requiring perfect timing to avoid moving obstacles
longDesc: World's Hardest Game lives up to its name with extremely challenging levels. Guide a red square through mazes while avoiding blue circles. Collect yellow circles and reach the green zone to complete each level.

name: Funny Shooter 2
desc: Chaotic shooter with ragdoll physics and absurd weapons
longDesc: Funny Shooter 2 combines first-person shooting with physics-based humor. Fight against waves of enemies using a variety of weapons while ragdoll physics create unpredictable and entertaining combat scenarios.

name: Monkey Mart
desc: Management game where you run a supermarket staffed by monkeys
longDesc: Monkey Mart is an idle management game where you control a monkey operating a supermarket. Plant crops, stock shelves, and serve customers. Expand your store and hire more monkeys to automate operations.

name: Crossy Road
desc: Endless arcade game where you guide characters across roads and rivers
longDesc: Crossy Road modernizes Frogger with voxel graphics. Navigate through traffic, rivers, and train tracks in an endless format. Features numerous unlockable characters with different themes.

name: Stickman Hook
desc: Physics-based swinging game where a stickman grapples through levels
longDesc: Stickman Hook features momentum-based swinging mechanics. Tap to hook onto anchors and build momentum to fly through levels. Timing and rhythm are key to completing each stage efficiently.

name: Eggy Car
desc: Drive a car with an egg on top without breaking it
longDesc: Eggy Car challenges you to drive across hilly terrain while balancing an egg on your vehicle. Navigate bumps and jumps carefully to prevent the egg from falling and breaking. Collect coins for upgrades.

name: Bacon May Die
desc: Action game where bacon fights through waves of enemies
longDesc: Bacon May Die is a hack-and-slash game featuring anthropomorphic food characters. Fight through increasingly difficult waves using various weapons and combos. Features both story and endless modes.

name: Buckshot Roulette
desc: Russian roulette variant played with a shotgun in a dark atmosphere
longDesc: Buckshot Roulette is a tense game of chance with strategic elements. Players take turns with a shotgun that may or may not be loaded. Use items to gain advantages and survive more rounds than your opponent.
